data.meanings: safety/security/freedom/immunity, to escape, salutation/greeting/peace, deliver/acknowledge, pay in advance, submit, sincerity, humility, submission/conformance/obedience, resign/quit/relinquish, to be in sound condition, well without blemish, gentle/tender/soft/elegant. data.sentence: The word أَسْلَمَا comes from the root س ل م and is associated with the meanings: safety/security/freedom/immunity, to escape, salutation/greeting/peace, deliver/acknowledge, pay in advance, submit, sincerity, humility, submission/conformance/obedience, resign/quit/relinquish, to be in sound condition, well without blemish, gentle/tender/soft/elegant. Solomon/Sulaiman.

data.meanings: To lay down, let down, threw down, drop, lay prostrate, lay one down upon one's kin, neck, cheek, or breast.. Shake, move, agitate, put in state of motion or commotion, rough/severe/vehement.. Sluggish, laziness.. Charge, upbraid, deliver.
data.sentence: The word وَتَلَّهُ comes from the root ت ل ل and is associated with the meanings: To lay down, let down, threw down, drop, lay prostrate, lay one down upon one's kin, neck, cheek, or breast.. Shake, move, agitate, put in state of motion or commotion, rough/severe/vehement.. Sluggish, laziness.. Charge, upbraid, deliver.

data.meanings: Cowardly, weak hearted, He held back/refrained through cowardice. The temple/side of the forehead, brow.
data.sentence: The word لِلْجَبِينِ comes from the root ج ب ن and is associated with the meanings: Cowardly, weak hearted, He held back/refrained through cowardice. The temple/side of the forehead, brow.
